      • authenticate

        boolean authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Method for authentication of user's credentials.
        Parameters:
        username - provided login
        password - provided password
        Returns:
        true if username and password are a match, false otherwise

      • register

        void register(User newUser)
              throws UserValidationException
        Method for registering a new user.
        Parameters:
        newUser - instance with new user data, expected not-null value
        Throws:
        UserValidationException - if the new user data instance is not in valid state, e.g. required fields are missing
